mentions.context: In the following, we list the evaluated NuSMV LTL model checking techniques presented in [4]:
The technique was introduced in another tool called nuXmv [3]: an extension for NuSMV.
Finally, we empirically evaluate the efficiency of existing MC tools (NuSMV [5] and nuXmv [3]) on EDF logical diagrams.
The technique was introduced in another tool called nuXmv [3]: an extension for NuSMV.
Finally, we empirically evaluate the efficiency of existing MC tools (NuSMV [5] and nuXmv [3]) on EDF logical diagrams.
For instance, Provost et al. [11] have proposed a translation of Grafcet specification models into Mealy machines to generate conformance test scenarios.
For this evaluation, the verification of each property was done using a well known symbolic model checking tool called NuSMV [5].
